description: Yay! Its the first day of December! Wether you celebrate Christmas, Hanukkah, Kwanzaa, or just the winter itself. We here at the advent calendar wish you a happy December!
Today is Pop Star's Britney Spears Birthday!...what not everything can be holiday related
Today is Let's Hug Day, so go give someone a hug today!
Today is Santa's List Day!, today
Today is Walt Disney's Birthday!, thanks for giving us Mickey Mouse!
Today is National Cotton Candy Day!
Today is National Christmas Tree Day in the United States!
Today A Charlie Brown Christmas was released in 1965!
Today the first Lord of the Rings film was released in 2001
Today is National Have a Bagel Day! So go have a bagel, my personal favorite is Everything Bagel
Today is Frank Sinatra's Birthday, today he would have been 110 years old
Today is Pop Star's Taylor Swift Birthday!
In the year 2025 today is the first night of Hanukkah!
Today is the start of Kwanzaa!
